narrative.narrative: Frontier Airlines is a US budget airline operating out of Denver since 1994. They operate flights to over 70 destinations on a fleet of 70 consisting of 35 Airbus A319's and about 20 A320's and used to operate 11 A318's and 737-200's and 737-300's. They have 20 Airbus A319neo's on order and 60 A320neo's on order. Greats Lakes Airlines operates Embraer EMB120's and Beechcraft 1990D's in Frontiers name also..
